flavorText: He calls on the forests for counsel and summons the earth to his cause.

foreignData.flavorText: Er fragt die Wälder um Rat und holt sich die Erde zur Hilfe.
foreignData.name: Riesenholz-Animist
foreignData.text: {T}: Ein Land deiner Wahl, das du kontrollierst, wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer X/X Elementarwesen-Kreatur, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Verbündeten ist, die du kontrollierst. Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignData.flavorText: Le pide consejo a los bosques y recluta a la tierra para su causa.
foreignData.name: Animista del Bosque Extenso
foreignData.text: {T}: La tierra objetivo que controlas es una criatura Elemental X/X hasta el final del turno, donde X es el número de Aliados que controlas. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: Il demande conseil aux forêts et rallie la terre à sa cause.
foreignData.name: Animiste de Vastebois
foreignData.text: {T} : Le terrain ciblé que vous contrôlez devient une créature X/X Élémental jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre d'alliés que vous contrôlez. C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignData.flavorText: Convoca la foresta come avvocato e la terra stessa come giudice.

foreignData.text: {T}: Una terra bersaglio che controlli diventa una creatura Elementale X/X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è il numero di Alleati che controlli. È ancora una terra.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼は森に助言を求め、地を召喚してその目的を成す。
foreignData.name: 巨森の精霊信者
foreignData.text: {T}：あなたがコントロールする土地１つを対象とする。それはターン終了時までＸ/Ｘのエレメンタル・クリーチャーになる。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする同盟者の総数に等しい。 それは土地でもある。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・シャーマン・同盟者

foreignData.flavorText: Он взывает к лесам за советом и призывает землю на помощь.

foreignData.flavorText: 他请求树林与之协商，召唤大地助其志业。

name: Vastwood Animist
originalText: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.

rulings.text: A land that becomes a creature may be affected by “summoning sickness.” You can’t attack with it or use any of its {T} abilities (including its mana abilities) unless it began your most recent turn on the battlefield under your control. Note that summoning sickness cares about when that permanent came under your control, not when it became a creature.

When a land becomes a creature, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. The permanent was already on the battlefield; it only changed its types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.
The value of X is determined as Vastwood Animist’s activated ability resolves. The power and toughness of the Elemental won’t change if the number of Allies you control changes later in the turn.

If you control no Allies when the ability resolves, the land becomes a 0/0 creature and is put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action. However, since Vastwood Animist is itself an Ally, the land will usually be at least a 1/1.

text: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.
